content.rendered:
On the 15th of April 2017, the third Morning Flick was back! This time, Prestige Motorcars and Hawk ‘n Poke came together in producing a car gathering like no other to watch the 8th and latest installment of the Fast & Furious franchise, the Fate of the Furious.

In the swanky Cinema XXI of Plaza Senayan, Jakarta, more than 10 automotive-clubs joined Morning Flick which made this one of the biggest gatherings of car-clubs in recent history. The 4-storey carpark was barely able to cope with the influx of sportscars and supercars from clubs such as the Lamborghini Club Indonesia, Ferrari Club Indonesia, Porsche Club Indonesia and many many more. 

For making, what essentially is heaven-on-earth for us as Indonesian motorheads possible and run smoothly, we cannot emphasize enough on the efforts made by our sponsors.

To all the sponsors, your support and guidance were immense and for that, we salute you.

During the entire event, a grand door prize was held to see who would win a brand new pair of Adidas Yeezy V2 Red Sneakers, presented to Morning Flick by Shoeprise, and it was Mr. Ebeth who turned out victorious to take the awesome sneakers home with him. Congratulations, Mr. Ebeth!

As the curtains of the event closes, we all took photos to commemorate this unforgettable occasion so that one day, we are able to show our children and our grandchildren that once upon a time, all of us took part in something so amazing and memorable, that is Prestige Motorcars and Hawk ‘n Poke’s Morning Flick.
